Thus Hamming distance turns into a metric space . Metric induces metric topology of open balls, we shall use these terms.

We are ready to define correcting codes. Consider a message of length with errors. It is a vector. And it has a distance from code subspace it was expected to be in defined as minimum of distances to words in a code. If where is a single closest word we say (assuming errors in used channel are rare) that is a correction of . Hence code corrects errors if every word in has a closed ball with center in it and radius with no other words of inside (including boundary).
